bibl.title: Gus Bendjus et al. v. Territory of Washington. Indictment
bibl.note: Our transcription is based on a digital image of the microfilmed original.

div1.p: In the District Court of the Second Judicial District of Washington Territory holding Terms at Montesano for Chehalis County, W.T.

Territory of Washington vs. Gus Beudjus Robert Strauglaud Ben Frederickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Strougburger, John Bleuding Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown John Saxon, John Thompson Alex Agreu Thomas Jacobs. E Emil. Andrew Anderson and Charles Burke Defendants } #135 Indictment

Gus Beudjus, Robert Strauglaud, Ben Frederickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Strougburger, John Bleuding, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Tompson, Alex Agreu, Thomas Jacoms, E Emil Andrew Anderson and Charles Burke are accused by the grand jury of Chehalis County Washington Territory by this indictment of the crime of Malicious Mischief committed as follows, to wit:

the said, Gus Beudjus, Robert Strouglaud, Ben Frederickson, Pete Peterson, Frank Nelson, Fred Strougburger, John Bleuding, Andrew Johnson, Leander Brown, John Saxon, John Thompson, Alex Agreu
II II
Thomas Jacobs, E Emil, Andrew Anderson and Charles Burke on the 9th day of September A.D. 1889, and is the right term, in the said County of Chehalis in the said Second Judicial District, in the Territory of Washington, then and there being one Pound rich of the value of $600.00, the property of one Wilson Graham, then & there being and situate in the said County and Territory, thereby maliciously intending to injure and destroy such Poundrich did willfully, maliciously, unlawfully, feloneously and with malace towards and against said Wilson Graham cut, tear, pull down injure and destroy to the great damage of the said Wilson Graham
Contrary to the statute in such case made and provided and against the peace & dignity of the Territory of Washington
